global_caption: a scene featuring a grandfather wearing a black beret, a white shirt, a gray cardigan, black pants, and black shoes, watching the right side; a mother wearing a white, flower-patterned one-piece dress and sandals, looking ahead while holding a brown basket; a father wearing a blue short-sleeved shirt and beige shorts, holding a black plate with many water bottles, and wearing sandals, seeing the front while holding a basket; a little girl wearing a sleeveless pink top and pink shoes while holding a yellow balloon and a brown teddy bear, watching the front; and a brown basket, while the mother and father are holding the same basket.
